errors.title: Inbox API Returns HTTP 500
errors.description: The notifications/inbox API endpoint is returning a 500 Internal Server Error, preventing the inbox from loading.
symptoms: Toast notification displays: 'Failed to load inbox'
Console error: 'Failed to fetch notifications: HTTP 500'
Inbox page shows empty state with error message
errors.impact: Users cannot view or manage their inbox notifications

errors.title: Settings Page Element Not Found Error
errors.description: JavaScript error occurs when attempting to interact with the Settings page, indicating a missing DOM element.
symptoms: Console error: 'Uncaught Error: Element not found'
Error occurs at line 412 of settings page
Browser automation fails when clicking Settings link
errors.impact: Settings page may not function correctly, potentially preventing users from accessing settings
errors.reproduction: Navigate to /settings page or click Settings link

errors.title: Project Cards Display Raw Timestamps
errors.description: Project cards on the Projects page display raw ISO 8601 timestamps instead of human-readable formatted dates.
symptoms: All three projects (Campfire, Locomotion, Mintory) display raw timestamps
Poor user experience with unformatted dates
errors.impact: Poor user experience, dates are not human-readable
errors.reproduction: Navigate to /projects page and view project cards
errors.recommendedFix: Format timestamps using date formatting utility (e.g., '2 days ago', 'Jan 12, 2026')

errors.title: Project Card Accessibility Text Issues
errors.description: Project card link accessibility text contains raw data and formatting issues that make it difficult for screen readers.
symptoms: Link name contains: 'Campfire Updated 2026-01-12T01:52:07.080707+00:00 Campfire project Progre 0 / 0 ta k U Unknown 0'
Text appears truncated or malformed ('ta k' instead of 'task', 'Progre' instead of 'Progress')
examples: Campfire Updated 2026-01-12T01:52:07.080707+00:00 Campfire project Progre 0 / 0 ta k U Unknown 0
Locomotion Updated 2026-01-12T01:52:07.080707+00:00 Locomotion project Progre 0 / 0 ta k U Unknown 0
errors.impact: Poor accessibility for screen reader users, confusing link descriptions
errors.reproduction: Navigate to /projects page and inspect project card links
errors.recommendedFix: Improve accessibility text with proper formatting and human-readable descriptions

warnings.message: Multiple console warnings about auth initialization
warnings.description: Console shows warnings about initial session loading and token in localStorage, but these are informational and not errors.
warnings.notes: These appear to be debug/informational messages, not actual errors

pagesTested.notes: Page loads but has UI formatting issues

recommendations.action: Investigate and fix the /api/notifications endpoint returning HTTP 500. Check server logs and database connectivity.
Fix the Settings page JavaScript error. Ensure all required DOM elements are present before accessing them.
Implement date formatting utility to display human-readable dates on project cards (e.g., '2 days ago', 'Jan 12, 2026').
Improve accessibility text on project cards with proper formatting and clear descriptions for screen readers.
